name: Intersection of First St and Hubbard Ave
description: The intersection of First Street and Hubbard Avenue, a charming corner in a peaceful neighborhood. You are at the intersection of First St and Hubbard Ave. Hubbard Ave continues its quiet descent to the north and south, a testament to the town's growing prosperity. First St stretches to the west, leading to other residential areas. The street is clean and well-maintained, with manicured lawns and charming homes. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird.
